questions.label: Surrender Charge Understanding
questions.hint: An annuity is a long-term contract with substantial penalties for early surrenders. Do you understand that withdrawals above the penalty-free amount will incur surrender charges, market value adjustments, and potentially a 10% tax penalty if under age 59½?

questions.label: Special Requests, Remarks, Corrections or Endorsements

disclosures.title: Certainty Select™ Disclosure Statement
disclosures.summary: Product disclosure for the Certainty Select Single Premium Deferred Annuity, including interest crediting, liquidity features, surrender charges, and market value adjustment details.

content.value:
Thank you for your interest in the Certainty Select annuity. Certainty Select is a single premium, multi-year guarantee annuity that accumulates interest through an interest rate that is guaranteed for a specified period. You may cancel your annuity Contract within a certain number of days of your receipt to receive a complete refund of your premium.

INTEREST CREDITING: The Accumulation Value of your annuity equals the single premium paid, less withdrawals (if applicable), accumulated at the current interest rate. The current interest rate will be guaranteed for the Rate Guarantee Period chosen by you.

LIQUIDITY FEATURES: You may receive partial surrenders or periodic income payments. You may be subject to a 10% Federal penalty tax if you make withdrawals before age 59½.

Penalty-Free Withdrawals: You may withdraw interest earned without a Surrender Charge or MVA.

Surrender Charges: This annuity product is a long-term Contract with substantial penalties for early surrender.

Market Value Adjustment: We may make a Market Value Adjustment (MVA) on amounts withdrawn or surrendered. It may result in either an increase or a decrease.

Nursing Home Waiver: After the first Contract Year, you may surrender without charges if confined to a Hospital or Nursing Care Center for 90+ consecutive days.

Terminal Illness Rider: You may access up to 75% of your Contract's Accumulation Value without a Surrender Charge if terminally ill.

Death Benefit: The death benefit is equal to the Accumulation Value.

acknowledgment.label: I acknowledge that I have read, or have been read, this document and understand I am applying for a single premium deferred annuity. I also acknowledge that the annuity meets my financial objectives.

disclosures.title: Important Notice: Replacement of Life Insurance or Annuities
disclosures.summary: ET-RPL-4900 – Important considerations about the effects of replacing an existing insurance policy or annuity contract.

content.value:
You are contemplating the purchase of a life insurance policy or annuity contract. In some cases this purchase may involve discontinuing or changing an existing policy or contract. If so, a replacement is occurring.

You should carefully consider whether a replacement is in your best interests. You will pay acquisition costs and there may be surrender costs deducted from your policy or contract. You may be able to make changes to your existing policy or contract to meet your insurance needs at less cost.

Consider: Are premiums affordable? Could they change? What surrender charges apply? What are the interest rate guarantees? What are the tax consequences?

acknowledgment.label: I certify that the responses herein are, to the best of my knowledge, accurate.

disclosures.title: Privacy Notice
disclosures.summary: ET-PRI-4905 – EquiTrust's privacy practices regarding collection, use, and sharing of personal information.

content.value:
This notice is required by law. It explains our information practices. Our practices apply to all current, former and future customers.

Information We Collect: We collect information from your application, authorized sources, transactions, consumer reporting agencies, and public records.

The Security of Your Information: We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards that comply with state and federal regulations.

Information We Share: We may share information with affiliates for servicing and with business partners under joint marketing agreements. We do not share medical information for marketing purposes.

acknowledgment.label: I acknowledge receipt of the Privacy Notice.
